features.title: unified search added to people view
Hey Nomie fam! As the crazy 2020 summer rolls to a close, I present to you another Nomie updat to fix bugs, and to launch handful of new features. I hope you like it. -B
Auto related lookup now has a progress indicator, and is faster.
Daily average added to stats overview
Double tap support on the select tracker/people/context popup
Improved search, saved search results, AND/OR operator and Latin support
Saving of Location from the location viewer.
Positivity selector like Facebook's reaction popup
New/Improved UOMs: New Pages, mg/dl. Seconds, Minutes now show as 00:00:00
On enter+command or enter+ctrl to save a note - props to @podiboq
